text: Masque of the Red Death is an anthology album by avant-garde musician Diamanda Galás, released on 1 December 1988 by Mute Records. It comprises three studio albums previously issued only on LP: The Divine Punishment, Saint of the Pit and You Must Be Certain of the Devil. ==Track listing== ==Release history== {|class="wikitable" ! Region ! Date ! Label ! Format !
